alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Maury; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 2:57AM CDT until April 28 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Marshall County in Middle Tennessee... Central Maury County in Middle Tennessee... South central Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 256 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Columbia, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Spring Hill, Mount Pleasant, Thompson`s Station and I-65 East Of Columbia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 39 and 57. Interstate 840 between mile markers 32 and 33. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
